lille1.global

Class City

  • java.lang.Object
    • lille1.global.City

  • public class City
extends java.lang.Object
    City is a class which represents a city where inhabitants will echange letters
    Author:
    Coillaux Thibault, Thiebault Laurent, Saab Mathieu

    • Method Detail

      • sendLetter

        public void sendLetter(Letter<?> letter)
        A method which will send a letter by adding it to a list of letters. All the letters in this list will be delivered
        Parameters:
        letter - a letter to send

      • distributeLetters

        public void distributeLetters()
        A method which will distribute letters by emptying the current postbox. Because when some letters have for action to send another letter, we create a temporary list of the letter to send Then the newly created letters will not be posted the same day

      • createInhabitants

        public void createInhabitants(int nb)
        A method which create nb inhabitants
        Parameters:
        nb - the number of inhabitants we want to create

        public java.lang.String getName()
        A method which returns the name of the city
        Returns:
        the name of the city

      • getInhabitants

        public java.util.List<Inhabitant> getInhabitants()
        A method which returns the list of all the inhabitants
        Returns:
        the list of all inhabitants in the city

      • getPostbox

        public java.util.List<Letter<?>> getPostbox()
        A method which returns the postbox, which is materialized by a list of letters
        Returns:
        a list of letters
